products.title: Bella Blackout Vine Green Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Vine Green Panel Blind in Green. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This bright lime green panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This green panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0219 Fabric Colour: Vine Green Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This Turquoise Blue panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3.5 metres drop! 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This blue panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0255 Fabric Colour: Turquoise Blue Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This Pear Green electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  The bright pear green of this fabric will look stunning when paired with natural and darker wooden tones and will beautifully compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This green roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
